bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Layer Transport Protocol for Time Sensitive Applications in Bridged Local Area Networks
IEEE Draft Standard for Layer Transport Protocol for Time Sensitive Applications in Bridged Local Area Networks
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1722/D2.2, Mar 2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies the protocol, data encapsulations, connection management and presentation time procedures used to ensure interoperability between audio and video based end stations that use standard networking services provided by all IEEE 802 networks meeting QoS requirements for time-sensitive applications by leveraging concepts of IEC 61883-1 through IEC 61883-8.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
